member.summary: Class for performing http requests

member.summary: Web request to the Rovio API
member.param: Command of the Rovio API to execute

member.name: T:RovioLib.RovioSettings
member.summary: Class for stroring connection settings

member.name: T:RovioLib.RovioController
member.summary: Class for accessing Rovio API

member.name: F:RovioLib.RovioController.rwc
member.summary: Internal object of RovioWebClient class

member.name: F:RovioLib.RovioController.rovioSettings
member.summary: Internal object of RovioSettings class

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor to RovioController object

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetReport
member.summary: Generates a report from libNS module that provides Rovio’s current status.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.StartRecoding
member.summary: Start recording a path.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.AbortRecording
member.summary: Terminates recording of a path without storing it to flash memory.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.StopRecording(System.String)
member.summary: Stops the recoding of a path and stores it in flash memory; javascript will give default name if user does not provide one.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.Deletepath(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes specified path.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetPathList
member.summary: Returns a list of paths stored in the robot.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.PlayPathForward(System.String)
member.summary: Replays a stored path from closest point to the end; If the NorthStar signal is lost, it stops.
member.remarks: In API 1.2 there is no mention of PathName parameter

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.PlayPathBackward(System.String)
member.summary: Replays a stored path from closest point to the beginning; If NorthStar signal is lost it stops.
member.remarks: In API 1.2 there is no mention of PathName parameter

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.StopPlaying
member.summary: Stop playing a path.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.PausePlaying
member.summary: Pause the robot and waits for a new pause or stop command.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.RenamePath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Rename the old path.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GoHome
member.summary: Drive to home location in front of charging station.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GoHomeAndDock
member.summary: Drive to home location in front of charging station and dock.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.UpdateHomePosition
member.summary: Define current position as home location in front of charging station.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.SetTuningParameters
member.summary: Change homing, docking and driving parameters – speed for driving commands. NOT IMPLEMENTED

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetTuningParameters
member.summary: Returns homing, docking and driving parameters.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ResetNavStateMachine
member.summary: Stops whatever it was doing and resets to idle state.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ManualDrive(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Accepts manual driving commands.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetMCUReport
member.summary: Returns MCU report including wheel encoders and IR obstacle avoidance.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ClearAllPaths
member.summary: Deletes all paths in the robot’s Flash memory.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetNavStatus
member.summary: Reports navigation state.
member.remarks: Name changed from GetStatus (in API two fucntions with same name)

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.SaveParameter(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Stores parameter in the robot’s Flash memory.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ReadParameter(System.Int64)
member.summary: Read parameter in the robot’s Flash memory.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetLibNSVersion
member.summary: Returns string version of libNS and NS sensor.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.EmailImage(System.String)
member.summary: Emails current image or if in path recording mode sets an action.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ResetHomeLocation
member.summary: Clears home location in the robot's Flash memory.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetData
member.summary: The basic command for acquiring MJPEG. NOT IMPLEMENTED

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetImage
member.summary: The basic command for acquiring Image. NOT IMPLEMENTED

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ChangeResolution(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the resolution setting of camera's images.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ChangeCompressRatio(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the quality setting of camera's images. (only available with MPEG4)
member.param: 0 – 2 (representing low, medium and high quality respectively)

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ChangeFramerate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the frame rate setting of camera's images.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ChangeBrightness(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the brightness setting of camera's images.
member.param: 0 - 6 (The lower the value is, the dimmer the image is)

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ChangeSpeakerVolume(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the Speaker Volume setting of camera.
member.param: 0 - 31 (The lower the value is, the lower the speaker volume is)

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.ChangeMicVolume(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change the Mic Volume setting of IP_Cam.
member.param: 0 - 31 (The lower the value is, the lower the mic volume is)

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.SetCamera(System.Int32)
member.summary: Change camera sensor’s settings.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetCamera
member.summary: Get the camera sensor’s settings.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetMyself(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the username who sent this HTTP request.
member.returns: Privilege = 0 (for common user),Privilege = 1 (for super user),(Always returns 0 if it is in Non-authorization mode under SetUserCheck.cgi)

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.SetUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a user or change the password for existed user.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.DelUser(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a user account.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetUser(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the users list of IP Camera.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.SetUserCheck(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable user authorization check.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.SetTime(System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set server time zone and time.
member.param: Time zone in minutes. (e.g. Beijing is GMT+08:00, TimeZone = -480)

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetTime
member.summary: Get current IP Camera's time zone and time.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.SetLogo(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set a logo string on the image.
member.param: 0 – top left, 1 – top right, 2 – bottom left, 3 – bottom right

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetLogo
member.summary: Get a logo string on the image.

member.summary: Get IP settings.

member.summary: Get WiFi settings.

member.summary: Get DDNS settings.

member.summary: Get Mac address.

member.summary: Get HTTP server's settings.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.GetMail
member.summary: Get email settings.

member.name: M:RovioLib.RovioController.SendMail
member.summary: Send an email with IPCam images.

member.summary: Get camera's name.

member.summary: Get Rovio’s system logs information.

member.summary: Change all settings to factory-default.
